name: APOTHEOSIS
blurb: Beautiful and different project with a new and unique 2D engine allowing for 3D movement. Fresh air set in a medieval world.

rewards.reward: A beautiful desktop wallpaper based upon the project's cover image. Available in white or black. I will be completely grateful for your vote of confidence, and THANK YOU tremendously.
A digital copy of the final product. Plus access to the pre-release we will be doing. Previous tiers included as well. My immense and undying gratitude.
A SPECIAL EDITION digital copy of the final product. Plus the pre-release. As a bonus you get early access to both as well. Wallpaper included. I will never forget your kindness.

A game guide/Beautiful art book from this amazing game. Will be finished toward the end of the actual game production so we have tons of amazing art to fill it with. Signed by the artist's. You also get the $30 tier. I cannot imagine what kind of karma you have built up in your life.

Receive our project-only T-shirt and our wristband. Shirt comes in black or white, any size. The wristband is going to be light blue with white lettering recessed. Plus the $50 tier. Name will appear in credits with special thanks. If only there were more people like you in the world. Note: T-shirt and Band will be received after project ends. Other items like artbook will be received later.

Create-a-Heir. Help us create a future king for use in the game. Will be placed into a pool of potential heirs and depending on how any one game plays out that person may or may not become king of one or more nations. An exciting way to be part of the development process. Receive a Personal Call/ Skype/ Online multiplayer match (game of your choice) with me. Additionally you will receive access to our engine after its complete to make your own games or see how we worked. You also get the $100 tier. I probably will get weepy mind you.

Create-a-Ingredient. Help us design a plant in the game that will be seen by all. We will figure out every detail from the look, to how it grows, what properties it has, what it can be mixed with and how it interacts with the dynamic inventory system. Receive a Personal Call/ Skype/ Online multiplayer match (game of your choice) with me. Access to the complete engine. Receive the $250 tier. I don't know where you came from but I'm glad your here.

Create-a-Item/Weapon/Unique Material. Since were building this fantastic game on top of a crafting system. This reward offers a lot of fun. Help us design some unique one of a kind item in the game for everyone to come across and use. It can be a stand alone item or some kind of strange limited material to be used in creating items of their own. Figure out its properties, how it works, and what makes its special, and even backstory. Receive a Personal Call/ Skype/ Online multiplayer match (game of your choice) with me. Access to the complete engine. Also receive the $250 tier. At some point I will probably get your name tattooed on my body.

Create-a-Enemy. Get the opportunity to help us design the most evil or benign hostile life form in this game. Anything is game. Large crazy baddies or small weak fodder. Look, feel, location, everything is yours to decide. Along with this level of pledge I would want to meet you personally(U.S. Only). Either you come here or I go to you. We can hangout, get some food, and I will cry on your shoulder uncontrollably. Access to the complete engine. Get the $250 tier too. You are now my friend wether you like it or not.

Create-a-NPC. Join us in the whimsical and amazing process of creating a unique character that will populate this world. The sky is limit for this one. Anything you can dream up we will make it work. Everyone can meet this person in-game and depending on how they are written could help or hinder the player. Along with this level of pledge I would want to meet you personally(U.S. Only). Either you come here or I go to you. We can hangout, get some food, and I will cry on your shoulder uncontrollably. Access to the complete engine. Get the $250 tier too. I need your address so I can send you Holiday cards and to invite you to reunions.

Create-a-Area. THIS IS IT! Help design an entire area of this amazing world. Anything you want, forest grotto, desert monolith tower, deserted island, even a completely different realm hidden away with powerful magic. This is your opportunity to completely engage in this process. You will also need to design all associated backstory, items, buildings and people created for this area. Really fantastic reward. Receive everything else. At this level do I even have to say that you are changing the world here. You deserve sainthood. I cannot even begin to describe how this will affect this project. I love you.......
